name: HereAfter
0:
”Alexa open HereAfter”
”Tell me about your dad”
”What do you like to do for fun”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hereafter
Developer Terms of Use
des:
An experienced interviewer prepares your stories about first dates and first cars. About parents, grandparents, and best friends. About graduation days, birthdays, and wedding days. About seeing the love of your life, hearing a child’s first words, or feeling the breeze on a mountain peak. 

Using our revolutionary AI platform, we build a conversational legacy avatar to interactively share your stories and experiences. Fun, engaging, and always accessible, HereAfter is a personalized time capsule that talks!

Listen to the stories and access favorite family memories simply by invoking the linking your HereAfter account and invoking the HereAfter skill. Visit our website, https://www.hereafter.ai/, to watch a demo and get started now.
